import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import './UserProfileModal.css' function UserProfileModal({userItems, handleCloseModal}) { const {bio, full_name, location, items, image} = userInfoOnly const [userInfoOnly, setUserInfoOnly] = useState({}) const [formState, setFormState]=useState({ full_name: `${userInfoOnly.full_name}`, location: `${userInfoOnly.location}`, bio: `${userInfoOnly.bio}`, image: `${userInfoOnly.image}` }) //This function is setting state and adding in the user input values const handleProfileChange = (e) => { setFormState({...formState, [e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } const editUserProfile = (e) => { e.preventDefault() fetch(`http://localhost:9292/edituserprofile/${userItems.id}`, { method: "PATCH", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify({ full_name: formState.full_name, location: formState.location, bio: formState.bio, image: formState.image, }) }) handleCloseModal() .then(response => response.json()) .then(updateUserInfo => setUserInfoOnly(updateUserInfo)) } return ( <>




) } export default UserProfileModal
